role.argrole: from the rest of the people (usually marked by عن )

example.parse: (S (CONJ ف) (PP (PREP ب) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN النسبة)) (PP (PREP الى) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_GEN الفلسطينيين))))) (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يكفي) (NP-OBJ (IVSUFF_DO:3MP هم)) (NP-SBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM قيام) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الاجتماع)) (SBAR (WHNP-1 (REL_PRON الذي)) (S (VP (PRT (FUT_PART س)) (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يظهر) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (PP (PREP في) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN رأي) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MP هم)))) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN لعالم)) (NP (NOUN_QUANT+CASE_DEF_GEN كل) (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS ه))))) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (NP-TPC-2 (NOUN_PROP عرفات)) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS ليس) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-2)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJ+CASE_INDEF_ACC معزولاً)) (PP-MNR (PREP ك) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ما) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS قررت) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_NOM الحكومة) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_NOM الاسرائيلية))))))))))))))) (PUNC -LRB-)
ولي عهد رأس الخيمة المعزول* يرضخ لقرار عزله ويغادر إلى مسقط

arg.g: He (Crown Prince of Ras Al Khaimah)

role.argrole: thing or place is outlying/ distant or trapped
